pages.text: Long long ago there used to be a group keeping the equilibrium of the World.$(br2)They kept three Divine Blades called Kamuy.$(br2)They were all killed at the Beginning Year of the Lunar Calendar. And the three Blades were gone.

According to further research, the Kamuy Blades were not only three. There were many Blades which were not infused with Divine power, so-called "naked Kamuy".$(br2)I referred to historical records and acquired the method to smith a naked Kamuy Blade and infuse it with Divine power.$(br2)These Blades are not as good as the genuine ones which were lost.
